# iosxr_router_pim_ipv6 (Resource)

This resource can manage the Router PIM IPv6 configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_router_pim_ipv6" "example" {
  rp_addresses = [
    {
      address     = "2001:db8::1"
      access_list = "RP_ACL_V6"
      override    = true
    }
  ]
  rp_addresses_bidir = [
    {
      address     = "2001:db8::2"
      access_list = "BIDIR_ACL_V6"
      override    = true
    }
  ]
  rp_static_deny                              = "DENY_ACL_V6"
  accept_register                             = "REGISTER_ACL_V6"
  suppress_data_registers                     = true
  register_source                             = "Loopback0"
  suppress_rpf_change_prunes                  = true
  neighbor_filter                             = "NEIGHBOR_ACL_V6"
  convergence_rpf_conflict_join_delay         = 5
  convergence_link_down_prune_delay           = 10
  spt_threshold_infinity                      = true
  spt_threshold_infinity_group_list           = "SPT_GROUPS_V6"
  old_register_checksum                       = true
  neighbor_check_on_send                      = true
  neighbor_check_on_recv                      = true
  hello_interval                              = 30
  mdt_hello_interval                          = 60
  dr_priority                                 = 100
  join_prune_interval                         = 60
  join_prune_mtu                              = 1500
  propagation_delay                           = 500
  override_interval                           = 2500
  global_maximum_routes                       = 50000
  global_maximum_routes_threshold             = 40000
  global_maximum_route_interfaces             = 500000
  global_maximum_route_interfaces_threshold   = 400000
  global_maximum_register_states              = 30000
  global_maximum_register_states_threshold    = 25000
  global_maximum_packet_queue_high_priority   = 1048576
  global_maximum_packet_queue_low_priority    = 524288
  global_maximum_group_mappings_bsr           = 5000
  global_maximum_group_mappings_bsr_threshold = 4000
  global_maximum_bsr_crp_cache_maximum        = 1000
  global_maximum_bsr_crp_cache_threshold      = 800
  maximum_routes                              = 50000
  maximum_routes_threshold                    = 40000
  maximum_route_interfaces                    = 500000
  maximum_route_interfaces_threshold          = 400000
  maximum_register_states                     = 30000
  maximum_register_states_threshold           = 25000
  maximum_group_mappings_bsr                  = 5000
  maximum_group_mappings_bsr_threshold        = 4000
  maximum_bsr_crp_cache_maximum               = 1000
  maximum_bsr_crp_cache_threshold             = 800
  log_neighbor_changes                        = true
  rpf_vector_allow_ebgp                       = true
  rpf_vector_disable_ibgp                     = true
  rpf_vector_standard_encoding                = true
  rpf_topology_route_policy                   = "PIM_POLICY"
  mdt_neighbor_filter                         = "MDT_NEIGHBOR_ACL_V6"
  mdt_data_switchover_interval                = 30
  mdt_data_announce_interval                  = 60
  mdt_c_multicast_type                        = "pim"
  mdt_c_multicast_announce_pim_join_tlv       = true
  mdt_c_multicast_shared_tree_prune           = true
  mdt_c_multicast_suppress_shared_tree_join   = true
  mdt_c_multicast_suppress_pim_data_signaling = true
  mdt_c_multicast_shared_tree_prune_delay     = 3
  mdt_c_multicast_source_tree_prune_delay     = 3
  mdt_c_multicast_migration_route_policy      = "PIM_POLICY"
  allow_rp                                    = true
  allow_rp_list                               = "ALLOW_RP_ACL_V6"
  allow_rp_group_list                         = "ALLOW_GROUP_ACL_V6"
  sg_expiry_timer                             = 180
  sg_list                                     = "SG_ACL_V6"
  ssm_range                                   = "SSM_ACL_V6"
  ssm_allow_override                          = true
  bsr_candidate_bsr_address                   = "2001:db8::12"
  bsr_candidate_bsr_hash_mask_len             = 126
  bsr_candidate_bsr_priority                  = 100
  bsr_candidate_rps = [
    {
      address          = "2001:db8::13"
      group_list       = "BSR_RP_ACL_V6"
      priority         = 192
      interval         = 60
      bidir_group_list = "BSR_RP_ACL_V6"
      bidir_priority   = 192
      bidir_interval   = 60
    }
  ]
  bsr_relay_vrfs = [
    {
      vrf_name = "VRF1"
      listen   = true
    }
  ]
  interfaces = [
    {
      interface_name                       = "GigabitEthernet0/0/0/1"
      enable                               = true
      dr_priority                          = 100
      hello_interval                       = 30
      join_prune_interval                  = 60
      join_prune_mtu                       = 1500
      propagation_delay                    = 500
      override_interval                    = 2500
      neighbor_filter                      = "INTF_NEIGHBOR_ACL_V6"
      maximum_route_interfaces             = 10000
      maximum_route_interfaces_threshold   = 8000
      maximum_route_interfaces_access_list = "INTF_MAX_ROUTES_ACL_V6"
      bfd_multiplier                       = 3
      bfd_minimum_interval                 = 150
      bfd_fast_detect                      = true
      bsr_border                           = true
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `accept_register` (String) Registers accept filter
- `allow_rp` (Boolean) Sparse-Mode RP addresses to be allowed
- `allow_rp_group_list` (String) Access-list for allowed group ranges
- `allow_rp_list` (String) Access-list for allowed RP addresses
- `bsr_candidate_bsr_address` (String) IP address of configured BSR
- `bsr_candidate_bsr_hash_mask_len` (Number) BSR Hash Mask Length
  - Range: `0`-`128`
- `bsr_candidate_bsr_priority` (Number) BSR Priority
  - Range: `1`-`255`
- `bsr_candidate_rps` (Attributes List) BSR Candidate RP Configurations (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bsr_candidate_rps))
- `bsr_relay_vrfs` (Attributes List) vrf (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--bsr_relay_vrfs))
- `convergence_link_down_prune_delay` (Number) Delay prunes if route join state transitions to not-joined on link down
  - Range: `0`-`60`
- `convergence_rpf_conflict_join_delay` (Number) Delay in sending first join if RPF points to any downstream neighbor
  - Range: `0`-`15`
- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `all`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `dr_priority` (Number) Inherited by all interfaces : PIM Hello DR priority
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `global_maximum_bsr_crp_cache_maximum` (Number) Set maximum number of C-RP cache in BSR
  - Range: `1`-`10000`
- `global_maximum_bsr_crp_cache_threshold` (Number) Set threshold to print warning
  - Range: `1`-`10000`
- `global_maximum_group_mappings_bsr` (Number) Learned through the BSR distribution mechanism
  - Range: `1`-`10000`
- `global_maximum_group_mappings_bsr_threshold` (Number) Set threshold to print warning
  - Range: `1`-`10000`
- `global_maximum_packet_queue_high_priority` (Number) PIM high priority packet queue size in bytes
  - Range: `0`-`2147483648`
- `global_maximum_packet_queue_low_priority` (Number) PIM low priority packet queue size in bytes
  - Range: `0`-`2147483648`
- `global_maximum_register_states` (Number) PIM source register states for all VRFs
  - Range: `0`-`75000`
- `global_maximum_register_states_threshold` (Number) Set threshold to print warning
  - Range: `0`-`75000`
- `global_maximum_route_interfaces` (Number) PIM total interfaces on routes for all VRFs
  - Range: `1`-`1100000`
- `global_maximum_route_interfaces_threshold` (Number) Set threshold to print warning
  - Range: `1`-`1100000`
- `global_maximum_routes` (Number) PIM routes for all VRFs
  - Range: `1`-`200000`
- `global_maximum_routes_threshold` (Number) Set threshold to print warning
  - Range: `1`-`200000`
- `hello_interval` (Number) Inherited by all interfaces : Hello interval in seconds
  - Range: `1`-`3600`
- `interfaces` (Attributes List) Select an interface to configure (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--interfaces))
- `join_prune_interval` (Number) Inherited by all interfaces : Join-Prune interval
  - Range: `10`-`600`
- `join_prune_mtu` (Number) Inherited by all interfaces : Join-Prune MTU
  - Range: `576`-`65535`
- `log_neighbor_changes` (Boolean) Enable PIM neighbor state logging
- `maximum_bsr_crp_cache_maximum` (Number) Set maximum number of C-RP cache in BSR
  - Range: `1`-`10000`
- `maximum_bsr_crp_cache_threshold` (Number) Set threshold to print warning
  - Range: `1`-`10000`
- `maximum_group_mappings_bsr` (Number) Learned through the BSR distribution mechanism
  - Range: `1`-`10000`
- `maximum_group_mappings_bsr_threshold` (Number) Set threshold to print warning
  - Range: `1`-`10000`
- `maximum_register_states` (Number) PIM source register states
  - Range: `0`-`75000`
- `maximum_register_states_threshold` (Number) Set threshold to print warning
  - Range: `0`-`75000`
- `maximum_route_interfaces` (Number) PIM total number of interfaces on all routes
  - Range: `1`-`1100000`
- `maximum_route_interfaces_threshold` (Number) Set threshold to print warning
  - Range: `1`-`1100000`
- `maximum_routes` (Number) PIM routes
  - Range: `1`-`200000`
- `maximum_routes_threshold` (Number) Set threshold to print warning
  - Range: `1`-`200000`
- `mdt_c_multicast_announce_pim_join_tlv` (Boolean) Announce PIM MDT Join TLVs
- `mdt_c_multicast_hello_enable` (Boolean) Enable PIM Hellos over MDT
- `mdt_c_multicast_migration_route_policy` (String) Route policy to select customer routing
- `mdt_c_multicast_shared_tree_prune` (Boolean) Prune Shared Tree on RP PE for Source Active routes received
- `mdt_c_multicast_shared_tree_prune_delay` (Number) Delay before pruning I-S PMSI from S,G when SA received
  - Range: `0`-`1800`
- `mdt_c_multicast_source_tree_prune_delay` (Number) Delay before removing PMSI from olist after BGP withdrawal
  - Range: `0`-`300`
- `mdt_c_multicast_suppress_pim_data_signaling` (Boolean) Suppress PIM data signaling
- `mdt_c_multicast_suppress_shared_tree_join` (Boolean) Suppress shared tree joins
- `mdt_c_multicast_type` (String) MVPN customer routing commands
  - Choices: `bgp`, `pim`
- `mdt_data_announce_interval` (Number) Periodic Data MDT Join TLV interval
  - Range: `3`-`120`
- `mdt_data_switchover_interval` (Number) Data MDT switchover interval
  - Range: `3`-`60`
- `mdt_hello_interval` (Number) Hello interval for all MDT interfaces (seconds)
  - Range: `1`-`3600`
- `mdt_neighbor_filter` (String) Neighbor filter
- `multipath` (Boolean) Enable equal-cost multipath routing
- `multipath_hash_interface_extended` (Boolean) Enable interface extensions for non-unique next-hop addrs
- `multipath_hash_source_group` (Boolean) Enable source, group based multipath hashing (Compatible with IOS versions)
- `multipath_hash_source_nexthop` (Boolean) Enable source with next-hop multipath hashing (better distribution)
- `neighbor_check_on_recv` (Boolean) Enable this feature
- `neighbor_check_on_send` (Boolean) Enable this feature
- `neighbor_filter` (String) Neighbor filter
- `old_register_checksum` (Boolean) Generate registers compatible with older IOS versions
- `override_interval` (Number) Inherited by all interfaces : PIM Hello override interval
  - Range: `400`-`65535`
- `propagation_delay` (Number) Inherited by all interfaces : PIM Hello Propagation delay
  - Range: `100`-`32767`
- `register_source` (String) Source address to use for register messages
- `rp_addresses` (Attributes List) Configure Rendezvous Point (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rp_addresses))
- `rp_addresses_bidir` (Attributes List) Configure Rendezvous Point (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--rp_addresses_bidir))
- `rp_static_deny` (String) Configure static RP deny range
- `rpf_topology_route_policy` (String) Route policy to select RPF topology
- `rpf_vector_allow_ebgp` (Boolean) Allow origination of RPF vector over an eBGP session
- `rpf_vector_disable_ibgp` (Boolean) Disable origination of RPF vector over an iBGP session
- `rpf_vector_standard_encoding` (Boolean) Use RFC standard encode type
- `sg_expiry_timer` (Number) Configure SG expiry timer
  - Range: `40`-`57600`
- `sg_list` (String) Access-list of (S,G) routes for which expiry timer is applicable
- `spt_threshold_infinity` (Boolean) Always stay on shared-tree
- `spt_threshold_infinity_group_list` (String) Only stay on the shared-tree for specified groups
- `ssm_allow_override` (Boolean) Allow SSM ranges to be overridden by more specific ranges
- `ssm_disable` (Boolean) Disable use of all SSM group ranges
- `ssm_range` (String) Provide ACL that specifies non-standard SSM range
- `suppress_data_registers` (Boolean) Suppress data registers after initial state setup
- `suppress_rpf_change_prunes` (Boolean) Suppress prunes triggered as a result of RPF changes

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

### Nested Schema for `bsr_candidate_rps`

Required:

- `address` (String) BSR Candidate RP Configurations

Optional:

- `bidir_group_list` (String) Group List access-list
- `bidir_interval` (Number) C-RP Advertisement interval
  - Range: `30`-`600`
- `bidir_priority` (Number) C-RP Priority
  - Range: `1`-`255`
- `group_list` (String) Group List access-list
- `interval` (Number) C-RP Advertisement interval
  - Range: `30`-`600`
- `priority` (Number) C-RP Priority
  - Range: `1`-`255`


<a id="nestedatt--bsr_relay_vrfs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `bsr_relay_vrfs`

Required:

- `vrf_name` (String) vrf

Optional:

- `listen` (Boolean) Enable RP relay in listen mode


<a id="nestedatt--interfaces"></a>
### Nested Schema for `interfaces`

Required:

- `interface_name` (String) Select an interface to configure
- `maximum_route_interfaces` (Number) PIM downstream joined interfaces
  - Range: `1`-`1100000`

Optional:

- `bfd_fast_detect` (Boolean) Enable Fast detection
- `bfd_minimum_interval` (Number) Hello interval
  - Range: `3`-`30000`
- `bfd_multiplier` (Number) Detect multiplier
  - Range: `2`-`50`
- `bsr_border` (Boolean) Do not fwd BSR messages on this interface
- `disable` (Boolean) Disable PIM processing on this interface
- `dr_priority` (Number) PIM Hello DR priority
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `enable` (Boolean) Enable PIM processing on this interface
- `hello_interval` (Number) PIM neighbor Hello announcement interval
  - Range: `1`-`3600`
- `join_prune_interval` (Number) PIM periodic Join-Prune announcement interval
  - Range: `10`-`600`
- `join_prune_mtu` (Number) MTU to use when sending PIM J/P packets
  - Range: `576`-`65535`
- `maximum_route_interfaces_access_list` (String) Name of ACL that specifies to which routes to apply the maximum limit
- `maximum_route_interfaces_threshold` (Number) Threshold warning
  - Range: `1`-`1100000`
- `neighbor_filter` (String) PIM Neighbor filter on this interface
- `override_interval` (Number) PIM Hello override interval
  - Range: `400`-`65535`
- `propagation_delay` (Number) PIM Hello propagation delay
  - Range: `100`-`32767`


<a id="nestedatt--rp_addresses"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rp_addresses`

Required:

- `address` (String) Configure Rendezvous Point

Optional:

- `access_list` (String) Access list of groups that should map to given RP
- `override` (Boolean) Static RP config overrides auto-rp and BSR


<a id="nestedatt--rp_addresses_bidir"></a>
### Nested Schema for `rp_addresses_bidir`

Required:

- `address` (String) Configure Rendezvous Point

Optional:

- `access_list` (String) Access list of groups that should map to given RP
- `override` (Boolean) Static RP config overrides auto-rp and BSR

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_router_pim_ipv6.example ""
```
